original: The neon-lit chaos of Star Junction is the beating heart of Algonquin.  You can join the hordes of tourists staring at soft-porn advertising on gigantic video screens, watch a stream of meaningless stock numbers revolve around the BAWSAQ building, pay $250 for a horrible show, or do some celebrity-spotting outside the meTV studios.
translated: 星汇广场杂乱的霓虹灯正是Algonquin跳动的心脏。你可以和众多观光客一道，盯着巨大屏幕上的软色情广告，看着BAWSAQ交易所外墙毫无意义的股票代码，花250块看一场糟糕的演出，或是在meTV工作室外蹲守名人。
